abstract: The most respected Iowa poll finds that Mrs. Clinton’s lead over Senator Bernie Sanders of Vermont has shrunk to just 7 percentage points, while Mr. Trump’s favorability with Republicans has sharply increased,

headline.main: Iowa Poll Suggests Dangers for Hillary Clinton and Donald Trump’s Strengths

snippet: The most respected Iowa poll finds that Mrs. Clinton’s lead over Senator Bernie Sanders of Vermont has shrunk to just 7 percentage points, while Mr. Trump’s favorability with Republicans has sharply increased,
